Host an Event
Contact Us
Looking for the Perfect Event Venue?
Looking for the perfect beachfront venue? Whether it’s a birthday celebration, corporate gathering, or private party, Longboard Tiki Beach Grille offers a laid-back tropical vibe with stunning ocean views. Fill out the form below, and our team will help bring your event to life!
Longboards Tiki Beach Grille
1550 North Atlantic Ave
Cocoa Beach, Florida
32931-3268, USA
Thank you! We’ll be in touch with you soon.

Wave Hello

this is a test
!.intro-content
Longboards Tiki Beach Grille
World-Famous Coastin’
Whoever said “no shoes, no shirt, no problem” was right — and probably talking about Cocoa Beach. Leave your flip-flops behind and soak in the fun, food, and fruity drinks at Longboards Tiki Beach Grille, where the triumphant spirit of surf meets the calm rhythm of the shoreline.
Let's Hang Out
Food:
Open Every Day | 11:00am – 10:00pm
Drinks:
Sunday to Thursday | 11:00am – 10:00pm
Friday to Saturday | 11am – 12am
Live Entertainment:
Fridays  | 6:00 - 9:00 pm
Saturdays  |  6:00 - 9:00 pm
Sundays  |  Noon - 4:00 pm
Bites & Bevs
SEE MENU
Take in the Perfect View
We’re so close to the ocean, you could probably go for a swim while you wait for your food. Or, you could just feast your eyes on the kaleidoscope of blues and greens on one of the world’s most beautiful beaches.
Live Entertainment
Groovin’ to live music is good for the soul — just take a look around during any of our weekend jam sessions, hosted by local musicians on Friday and Saturday evenings as well as Sunday afternoons. Smiling faces and lovely people galore.
Learn More
(Be Happy) Hour
Time flies when you’re having rum, tequila, and something with body or bubbles.
Enjoy food and drink specials from 3:00 pm to 6:00 pm every afternoon from Sunday to Thursday.
Learn More
Get on Board
“Great place for afternoon drinks to escape a scorching sun or summer downpour! Walk up the boards to the oceanside bar which has benches with umbrellas and barstools looking over the water. Good place to catch a launch or watch the surf!”
- Michele Byrne, Google Reviews
“Great place! If you want a tiki bar atmosphere then look no further than Longboards. Great drinks and great food! I had loaded nachos with BBQ and it was delicious. Bartender was so friendly and checked on me multiple times. There is a deck and bar with drinks close to the beach. Felt like I was in Hawaii! 5 stars, check this place out!
”
-Robert, Google Reviews
“Awesome tiki bar right on the water in Cocoa Beach! Love this hotel and this bar! The bartenders are always super friendly as well.
”
-Jack Davis, Google Reviews
Float on By
When you’re as close to the crystal-clear waters of Cocoa Beach as we are, life's as easy as it is breezy. Our oceanfront location makes it easy to drift in for a post-surf sesh lunch or a lively night of delicious drinks and live music.
Chillin’
See FULL GALLERY

to Cocoa Beach
